common.somethingWrongRetry: Something went wrong. Please try again.

hero.tagline: You've spent years perfecting your {skill}; now, give it a {purpose}.
hero.description: Across the globe, visionary NGOs are working tirelessly to change lives, but they shouldn't have to do it alone. They have the passion, but they need your professional expertise to break through. {platformName} is the bridge between your talent and their impact. We believe that when your mastery meets their mission, the impossible becomes possible.
hero.ngoSubtitle: Register here if you are an NGO looking for talent
hero.impactAgentSubtitle: Register here if you are an individual looking to offer your skill

home.featuredProjectsDesc: A curated directory of high-impact opportunities from verified NGOs worldwide. Designed for architects of social change.
home.howItWorksDesc: Get started in three simple steps
home.ecosystemDesc: Where "Time" is the premium currency. Bridging the gap between world-class talent and social impact.
home.volStep1Desc: Sign up and showcase your skills, experience, and the causes you care about.
home.volStep2Desc: Browse meaningful opportunities matched to your expertise. Filter by skills, time, and location.
home.volStep3Desc: Complete opportunities, build your portfolio, and create lasting change for communities.
home.ngoStep1Desc: Describe your needs in just 5 minutes using our pre-scoped templates.
home.ngoStep2Desc: Browse impact agent profiles, check ratings, and find the perfect match for your opportunity.
home.ngoStep3Desc: Collaborate with skilled impact agents and receive professional-quality deliverables.
home.testimonialsDesc: Stories from our community of impact makers
home.testimonialsTitle: Trusted by the architects of social change.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Real stories from professional impact agents and the NGOs they've helped scale.
home.ctaTitle: Your Skills Can Change Lives. Start Today.
home.ctaDesc: Join thousands of skilled professionals who are using their expertise to support causes they care about. It takes just 5 minutes to get started.
home.impactDesc: Real numbers showing how skilled professionals are creating meaningful change across communities.
home.missionDesc: We believe everyone has the power to make a difference. JustBeCause Network connects skilled professionals with NGOs and social enterprises that need expertise — not just goodwill.
home.findBySkillDesc: Browse opportunities that match your expertise. Every skill has the power to create change.

footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest opportunities and impact stories delivered to your inbox.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Upgrade anytime.
pricing.contactSalesDesc: Need a custom solution for your large organization?
pricing.volunteerUpgradeHint: Upgrade your impact agent subscription below.
pricing.faqProfileUnlockAnswer: When you find a FREE impact agent you'd like to connect with, you need to unlock their profile to view their contact information. NGO Pro subscribers can unlock unlimited free impact agent profiles. Free plan NGOs must upgrade to Pro to unlock any profiles.
pricing.faqApplication: What counts as an application? (Impact Agents)
pricing.faqApplicationAnswer: Each time you apply to a project/opportunity, it counts as one application. Free plan includes {count} applications per month.
pricing.faqChangePlanAnswer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
pricing.faqRolloverAnswer: No, unused applications or unlocks do not roll over to the next month. Counters reset on the 1st of each month.
pricing.ngoFreeDesc: Perfect for small NGOs just getting started
pricing.ngoProDesc: Unlock unlimited FREE impact agent profiles
pricing.volFreeDesc: Start contributing and make an impact

ngoFreeLimitations: Cannot unlock FREE impact agent profiles
Upgrade to Pro to unlock impact agents
ngoProFeaturesDefault: Unlock UNLIMITED free impact agent profiles
View all paid impact agent profiles

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our mission to connect skills with purpose
about.heading: ABOUT US
about.heroPara1: At JustBeCause, we believe the best actions don't need a "why." Sometimes, being the reason for someone's smile, for a community's transformation, for a brighter future — that's reason enough.
about.heroPara2: We are not just a platform. We are a movement — a bridge between extraordinary professional talent and visionary NGOs striving to change the world. Our singular belief: when your mastery meets their mission, the impossible becomes possible.
about.brandLine: www.justbecausenetwork.com is a fully owned brand of Bizy Bees Asia Pte Ltd, Singapore.
about.missionQuote: To accelerate social impact by seamlessly connecting skilled professionals with mission-driven organizations — creating a world where expertise meets empathy, and every skill finds its purpose.
about.platformDesc: The JustBeCause Network introduces an advanced AI search engine JBCerta that goes beyond keywords. It understands context — your skills, your location, your availability, and your passion — and connects you with opportunities that truly fit.
about.forNGOsCardDesc: Find exactly the expertise you need — from web development to strategic consulting — without the guesswork.
about.forTalentCardDesc: Discover opportunities that match your unique skill set, schedule, and the causes you care about most.
about.mutualBenefitDesc: When the right skills meet the right mission, the result is transformative impact for everyone involved.
about.valuesSubtitle: These core principles guide everything we do at JustBeCause Network
about.valueImpactFirstDesc: Every decision we make is guided by the potential for positive social impact. We measure success not just in numbers, but in lives transformed.
about.valueCommunityDrivenDesc: Our strength lies in our community. We foster collaboration, mutual respect, and shared purpose among all our members.
about.valueExcellenceDesc: We believe that social impact deserves the same quality and professionalism as any commercial endeavor.
about.valueAccessibilityDesc: We are committed to making skills-based volunteering accessible to everyone, regardless of background or location.
about.teamSubtitle: Passionate individuals dedicated to connecting skills with purpose
about.teamEmpty: Our team is growing! Check back soon.
about.ctaPara: Whether you're a skilled professional looking to give back, or an NGO seeking talented individuals to help with your mission — JustBeCause Network is your platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.formDesc: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you.

forVolunteers.heroTitle: Your Skills Have the Power to Change a Life
forVolunteers.heroPara1: JustBeCause Network connects skilled professionals like you with NGOs and social enterprises that need your expertise. Whether you can spare a few hours a week or want to take on a major project, your professional skills can create lasting impact.
forVolunteers.heroPara2: As an Impact Agent, you're not just volunteering — you're bringing professional-grade expertise to organizations that need it most. From web development to financial planning, your skills are the currency of change.
forVolunteers.heroPara3: Join a global community of professionals who believe that when mastery meets mission, the impossible becomes possible.
forVolunteers.exchangeSubtitle: Impact Agents (Professionals): Your "Time" is the new currency.
forVolunteers.proBonoDesc: Offer your skills completely free of charge. Perfect for giving back to causes you care about deeply.
forVolunteers.lowBonoDesc: Offer your services at a significantly reduced rate. Ideal for ongoing or larger commitments.
forVolunteers.comboDesc: Mix and match — offer some services pro bono and others at a reduced rate based on the project.
forVolunteers.whyBecomeSubtitle: Skills-based contributions offer unique benefits that go beyond traditional volunteering
forVolunteers.benefitPortfolioDesc: Work on real-world projects that showcase your abilities. Build a portfolio that demonstrates both your skills and values.
forVolunteers.benefitSkillsDesc: Step outside your comfort zone. Take on challenges in new domains while honing your existing expertise.
forVolunteers.benefitDifferenceDesc: See the direct impact of your work. Every project you complete helps an NGO better serve their community.
forVolunteers.benefitFlexibleDesc: Choose opportunities that fit your schedule. Contribute a few hours or take on longer engagements — it's up to you.
forVolunteers.benefitRecognizedDesc: Earn ratings, reviews, and endorsements from the organizations you help. Build your impact reputation.
forVolunteers.benefitCommitmentDesc: From quick consultations to full project management — find opportunities that match your availability.
forVolunteers.howItWorksSubtitle: Getting started is easy — here's what to expect
forVolunteers.step1Desc: Sign up and showcase your skills, experience, and the causes you care about.
forVolunteers.step2Desc: Discover meaningful opportunities matched to your expertise.
forVolunteers.step3Desc: Apply to opportunities and connect directly with NGOs.
forVolunteers.step4Desc: Work on real projects, earn recognition, and create lasting change.
forVolunteers.storiesSubtitle: Hear from impact agents who have made a difference through their skills
forVolunteers.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about becoming an impact agent
forVolunteers.faq1Q: Is it really free to join as an impact agent?
forVolunteers.faq1A: Yes! Signing up as an impact agent is completely free. You can browse opportunities, create your profile, and apply to projects at no cost.
forVolunteers.faq2Q: How much time do I need to commit?
forVolunteers.faq2A: It's entirely up to you. Some opportunities require just a few hours, while others are longer engagements. You choose what fits your schedule.
forVolunteers.faq3Q: What types of skills are in demand?
forVolunteers.faq3A: Everything from web development, design, and marketing to financial planning, legal advice, and strategic consulting. If you have professional skills, there's an NGO that needs them.
forVolunteers.faq4Q: Will I get recognition for my work?
forVolunteers.faq4A: Absolutely! NGOs can rate and review your contributions. You'll build a verifiable impact portfolio that showcases your pro bono work.
forVolunteers.faq5Q: Can I choose which NGOs to work with?
forVolunteers.faq5A: Yes, you have full control over which opportunities you apply to. Browse by cause, skill requirement, location, and time commitment.
forVolunteers.faq6Q: What if I want to offer paid services too?
forVolunteers.faq6A: You can! Our platform supports pro bono (free), low bono (discounted), and paid engagements. Set your own terms for each opportunity.
forVolunteers.ctaHeading: Ready to Start Making an Impact?
forVolunteers.ctaPara: Join our community of skilled impact agents who are using their expertise to create lasting positive change around the world.

forNGOs.heroTitle: For NGOs: Build Your Dream Team
forNGOs.heroPara1: Access a global network of skilled professionals ready to help your organization thrive. From web development to strategic planning, find the talent you need — pro bono or at discounted rates.
forNGOs.heroPara2: Post your opportunities, review applications from vetted impact agents, and get professional-quality deliverables that would otherwise cost thousands.
forNGOs.helpTitle: How We Help NGOs Build Their Dream Team
forNGOs.helpSubtitle: Access the talent you need through multiple pathways
forNGOs.customJobDesc: Create detailed opportunity listings that attract the right talent. Our AI matching ensures your posting reaches professionals with the exact skills you need.
forNGOs.proBonoDbDesc: Access our growing database of professionals offering their skills for free or at discounted rates. Filter by skill, location, and availability.
forNGOs.skillMatchDesc: Our advanced matching algorithm connects your needs with the most qualified impact agents, saving you time and ensuring quality results.
forNGOs.whyChooseSubtitle: Get the professional support you need to amplify your impact
forNGOs.benefit1Desc: Post detailed opportunity listings with skill requirements, timelines, and deliverables. Attract the right talent for your specific needs.
forNGOs.benefit2Desc: Browse and connect with professionals offering their services free or at reduced rates. Save on costs while getting expert help.
forNGOs.benefit3Desc: Our AI-powered matching ensures you find professionals with exactly the skills your project demands.
forNGOs.benefit4Desc: All our impact agents go through a verification process. View their ratings, reviews, and portfolio before connecting.
forNGOs.benefit5Desc: Use our pre-built templates to create opportunity listings in minutes. Describe your needs quickly and accurately.
forNGOs.benefit6Desc: Communicate directly with impact agents through our platform. Share files, track progress, and manage deliverables.
forNGOs.valueCalcTitle: See the Value You Could Receive
forNGOs.valueCalcSubtitle: Based on average consultant rates of $75/hour, here's what you could save:
forNGOs.faq1Q: Is it free for NGOs to join?
forNGOs.faq1A: Yes! Creating an account and posting opportunities is free. We offer a Pro plan for NGOs that need to unlock unlimited impact agent profiles.
forNGOs.faq2Q: How do I find the right impact agent?
forNGOs.faq2A: Post your opportunity with detailed requirements. Our AI matching will surface the best candidates. You can also browse our database and filter by skills.
forNGOs.faq3Q: What types of projects can I post?
forNGOs.faq3A: Anything your organization needs — website development, graphic design, marketing strategy, financial planning, legal consultation, and much more.
forNGOs.faq4Q: How long does it take to find help?
forNGOs.faq4A: Most NGOs receive applications within 48 hours of posting. For specialized skills, it may take a bit longer.
forNGOs.faq5Q: Can I offer paid opportunities too?
forNGOs.faq5A: Absolutely! You can post pro bono, low bono (discounted), or paid opportunities. Flexibility is key to attracting the best talent.
forNGOs.faq6Q: How do I know the quality will be good?
forNGOs.faq6A: All impact agents have verified profiles with ratings and reviews. You can review their portfolio and past work before accepting any application.
forNGOs.ctaHeading: Ready to Find Your Impact Agents?
forNGOs.ctaPara: Join hundreds of NGOs already benefiting from skilled professional support. Post your first opportunity in minutes.

payment.paymentGatewayConfigurationDescription: Configure your payment gateway (Stripe or Razorpay). Keys are stored securely in the database.
payment.liveModeHint: Enable to process real payments. Keep disabled for testing.
payment.publishableKeyHint: Safe to expose - used on frontend
payment.secretKeyHint: Keep secret - stored encrypted in database
payment.stripeStep1: Go to Stripe Dashboard → API Keys
payment.stripeStep2: Copy your Publishable key (pk_live_... or pk_test_...)
payment.stripeStep3: Reveal and copy your Secret key (sk_live_... or sk_test_...)
payment.stripeStep4: For testing, use test mode keys first
payment.razorpayStep1: Go to Razorpay Dashboard → API Keys
payment.razorpayStep2: Generate new keys or copy existing ones
payment.razorpayStep3: Use test mode keys for development
payment.testPaymentDescription: Create a test payment to verify your payment gateway is working correctly. This will create a real payment intent but won't charge unless completed.
payment.testPaymentHint: This creates a PaymentIntent. Check the browser console for details.
payment.currencyAndPricingDescription: Configure your payment currency and default pricing
payment.currencyHint: All prices will be displayed in this currency
payment.ngoProSubscriptionDescription: NGOs with Pro subscription can unlock unlimited FREE impact agent profiles. NGOs can view paid impact agent profiles without subscription.
payment.impactAgentProSubscriptionDescription: Impact Agents with Pro subscription can apply to unlimited jobs. Free impact agents are limited to {count} applications/month.
payment.businessModelNote: Note: Individual profile unlock payments are not part of the business model. NGOs must upgrade to Pro to unlock impact agent profiles.

volunteerPlans.freePlanDescription: Configure limits for impact agents on the free plan
volunteerPlans.applicationsPerMonthHint: Number of opportunity applications allowed per month
volunteerPlans.profileVisibilityHint: Allow free plan impact agents to be visible in search
volunteerPlans.proPlanDescription: Configure pricing and features for the impact agent pro plan
volunteerPlans.proPlanFeaturesHint: These features are displayed on the pricing page

ngoPlans.freePlanDescription: Configure limits for NGOs on the free plan
ngoPlans.opportunitiesPerMonthHint: Number of opportunities NGOs can post per month
ngoPlans.profileUnlocksPerMonthHint: Free profile unlocks (0 = must upgrade to Pro)
ngoPlans.proPlanDescription: Configure pricing and features for the NGO pro plan
ngoPlans.proPlanFeaturesHint: These features are displayed on the pricing page

features.featureTogglesDescription: Enable or disable platform features globally
features.paymentsFeatureHint: Enable payment processing for subscriptions and profile unlocks
features.messagingFeatureHint: Allow users to send messages to each other
features.notificationsFeatureHint: Send email and in-app notifications to users

integrations.smsProviderConfigurationDescription: Configure SMS provider for phone number verification during onboarding
integrations.devModeHint: In development mode, OTP codes are shown in console/browser
integrations.twilioPhoneNumberHint: The phone number SMS messages will be sent from
integrations.fromNumberBrandNameHint: Can be a brand name (alphanumeric) or phone number. Brand names work in most countries.
integrations.vonageStep3: Copy your API Key and API Secret
integrations.testSmsConfigurationDescription: Send a test SMS to verify your configuration is working
integrations.configureProviderFirst: Configure an SMS provider above before testing
integrations.requirePhoneVerificationHint: Require impact agents to verify their phone number during onboarding

security.emailVerificationHint: Require users to verify their email address before using the platform
security.ngoVerificationHint: Require NGOs to be verified by admin before they can post opportunities

toasts.settingsSaved: Settings saved successfully — changes will propagate to all users within minutes
toasts.smsTestPhoneRequired: Please enter a phone number to test

team.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

toasts.discountRequired: Discount value must be greater than 0

toasts.userIdsRequired: Please enter user IDs for specific targeting

admins.title: Admin Management
admins.subtitle: Manage administrator accounts for the platform
admins.createNewAdminAccountDescription: Add a new administrator who will have full access to the admin panel.
admins.administratorAccountsDescription: These users have full access to the admin panel and can manage all aspects of the platform.
admins.noAdminAccountsDescription: Create the first admin account to get started
admins.securityNote1: Admin accounts have full access to all platform data and settings.
admins.securityNote2: Admin accounts cannot be created through the normal signup flow.
admins.securityNote3: Only existing admins can create new admin accounts.
admins.securityNote4: For the first admin, use the seed script:
